short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: This extension is used with Tag Turbo, website tracking tool that help you streamline your tracking processes.

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
Tag Turbo integrates with platforms to produce tags that capture data from Web pages.

Tag Turbo is an assistant that will assist you in creating and managing tags as you see appropriate. Click on the website element that you wish to gather event data from and send to an analytics platform, such as Google Analytics 4.

With some options, you can:
• Click to select the website element
• Set the data information you want to send out
